description: Franklin Mint Crystal Salad Dessert Plate $25.00 The Details Welcome the month of January with elegant brilliant crystal beautifully reflects light. The pattern depicts a view of the memories of...
cleaned_text: Welcome the month of January with elegant brilliant crystal beautifully reflects light. The pattern depicts a view of the memories of life in America. It makes a beautiful and classic gift, suitable for any occasion. Or perhaps treat yourself to a great addition to create special charm to your table setting, breakfast coffee & tea bar cart, or cabinet display. Vintage finest exquisite craftsmanship with history and charm. Don't miss out on this stunning piece ready for use, gifting, or worthy to put on display. No chips, cracks, crazing, scratches, staining, repairs or usage signs. Welcome if you see something you fancy, Reply by Email Make an enquiry, simply ask. For reserve and collect it enquiries and further information, please provide your name, telephone number, and a brief note for a response to your enquiry. It's always a pleasure to assist you with any questions and advice and will respond as soon as possible. And may your day be lovely! Local pickup Lakewood Ranch, Cash only, No cards, no masks
